STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
DOES THIS MAN REALLY WANT TO BE PRIME MINISTER?
Mr Howard's press release of today on Small Business includes the following:
A Coalition Government will:
reduce the number of surveys and rationalise the role of all
Government agencies in the collection and collation of statistical data
from the small business sector;, and
establish a comprehensive small business data series on all aspects of
the Australian small business sector.
